name: Turn your Destiny
description: Turn Your Destiny is a new addictive Match-4-or-more puzzle game. Solve each level and control your destiny!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows7/8.1/10 Processor: Intel Core2 Duo 2.4GHz or higher Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 7600GT, Radeon X1650XT or higher DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 300 MB available space
